welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Cheam, where the quaint streets and historical landmarks await you. Known for its rich history and picturesque beauty, we invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Heathrow's newest terminal, opened in 2014 and primarily used by Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, opened in 1961 and used by a variety of airlines including Oneworld members.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Opened in 1986 and used by SkyTeam and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, opened in 2008 and used by British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for the first 45 minutes, then a fee applies

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The second terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
